data.comment: The match has started at Nabizao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Bergson (Fortaleza) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, In Braganca Paulista Bragantino drive forward through Claudinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Nabizao.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Bergson (Fortaleza) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Bragantino push forward at Nabizao and Lucas Evangelista gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Fortaleza defence.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 13, Goal! Bragantino take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Luan Candido.
Great play from Artur to set up the goal.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 15, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 20, Bragantino's Artur gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In Braganca Paulista, Osvaldo of Fortaleza is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Fortaleza's David gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Raul is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, At Nabizao, Lucas Evangelista has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Bragantino's Raul looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Fortaleza's Juninho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 34, Bragantino have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
Fortaleza's Bergson is whistled for offside at Nabizao.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 39, Bragantino's Artur is on target but unsuccessful.
Bragantino's Artur breaks free at Nabizao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Nabizao.
Fortaleza have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Osvaldo for Fortaleza gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Bragantino.
Fortaleza pushes forward through Bergson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 45, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Ligger (Bragantino) has received a yellow card from Heber Roberto Lopes.
Juninho scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
The second-half is underway at Nabizao.
In the minute 47, In Braganca Paulista Fortaleza attack through Felipe. The finish is off target, however.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 48, In Braganca Paulista Bragantino attack through Ytalo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Attention is being given to Fortaleza’s Juninho and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Juninho has recovered and rejoins the match in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino drives forward and Tomas Cuello gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Bragantino.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Evangelista of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 56, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 59, Bragantino's Artur misses with an attempt on goal.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Alerrandro is replacing Ytalo for the home team.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Free kick Bragantino.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Claudinho for Bragantino drives towards goal at Nabizao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Bragantino are coming forward and Claudinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 63, Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcelo Chamusca (Fortaleza) is making a first substitution, with Yuri Cesar replacing Osvaldo.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Bergson with Wellington Paulista.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leo Ortiz (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Nabizao.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Fortaleza drive forward but Mariano Vazquez is judged offside.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Nabizao.
Fortaleza's Juninho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 68, Fortaleza pushes forward through David, whose finish on goal is saved.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In Braganca Paulista, Wellington Paulista (Fortaleza) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 69, Heber Roberto Lopes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luan Candido for Bragantino has been booked by Heber Roberto Lopes and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Bragantino's area.
In the minute 71, Morato is replacing Tomas Cuello for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 73, Gabriel Dias is on a sub for Mariano Vazquez for Fortaleza.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Lucas Evangelista gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bragantino.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Claudinho of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 77, Bragantino needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
Fortaleza's Felipe has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Claudinho for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 80, Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Bragantino's area.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Gabriel Dias (Fortaleza) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Claudinho with Ricardo Ryller. This is the third substitution made today by Mauricio Barbieri.
Free kick Bragantino.
Bragantino make their fourth substitution with Thonny Anderson replacing Lucas Evangelista.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Felipe with Ronald.
Joao Paulo is on a sub for David for Fortaleza.
In the minute 86, Fortaleza push forward at Nabizao and Juninho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bragantino defence.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Goal! Bragantino have got their heads in front thanks to a Thonny Anderson strike.
That's a fine assist from Artur.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Bragantino.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Bragantino!
Heber Roberto Lopes blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
